items.label: Routing
items.text: Router loads hooks for themes, modules, JSON, and plugins. Stable.

items.label: Utilities
items.text: Utility functions for JSON handling, rendering, cron, and theme helpers. Auto Updating and Core Overwrite on Update.

items.label: Libraries
items.text: Library functions for handling of content. JSON, MD, and more. Common aspects of the site.

items.label: Modules
items.text: Modules provide your site's content and functionality. Core routing and sample modules are working. Module creator is pending.

items.label: Themes
items.text: Themes control the visual aspect of your domain. Minimal theme live, assets organized. Theme creator is pending.

items.label: Plugins
items.text: Plugins extend the core without touching it. Managed in admin. Plugin creator is pending. Core Plugin Loader.

items.label: Admin
items.text: Admin panel for managing users, posts, settings, pages, plugins, and themes.

items.label: Mailer
items.text: Mailer system for sending email from your domain, managed in admin (schema ready, integration in-progress).

items.label: Documentation
items.text: Project documentation. Needs full user and developer guides.
